oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words and sentences including the names of weapons and things belonging to different peoples found in !kun country (the Makoba, the Shimbari and the |nani). There are also descriptions and names of some edible plants, berries and trees. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: things belonging to different peoples in !nanni and Tamme's country, and plants and trees
